transform_your_development_experience: Transform your development experience with our ultra-customizable, developer-friendly admin template: crafting exceptional user journeys made effortless.
premium_budget_friendly_solutions: Premium, budget-friendly solutions for web applications, regardless of size, utilizing the most trusted frameworks and familiar tools.
dashtail_admin_template_offers_a_variety: DashTail Admin Template offers a variety of carefully designed components, perfect for creating advanced reusable components, pages,dashboard etc.
define_your_digital_environment: Define your digital environment: navigate through our comprehensive selection of customizable color schemes, perfect for matching any brand identity.
express_your_own_style: Express Your Own Style With Use One Click
using_top_ui_frameworks: Using top UI frameworks and the latest technologies, build your dream app with our platform, supported by regular updates. Explore the tech we employ.
empower_your_design_process: Empower Your Design Process with the DashTail Admin Dashboard, Featuring an Exclusive Figma File for Enhanced Customization Options.
since_2017_we_ve_been_helping: Since 2017, we've been helping developers, entrepreneurs, startups, and government agencies. Count on CodeShaper to provide a tailored transformation that fits your business goals perfectly.
if_you_have_any_questions: If you have any questions or encounter issues with our script, our support team is available to assist you. They'll respond to inquiries and provide limited support through our dedicated support system.
your_question_may_have_already_been_addr: Your question may have already been addressed on our Discord server. Feel free to ask any questions about our template there as well. Join our Discord server to connect with us.
got_questions: Got Questions? We've compiled a list of answers to your frequently asked questions. If you can't find what you're looking for here, don't hesitate to reach out to us.
a_regular_license_is_designed_for: A Regular License is designed for a single end-product that is free for end-users. This license is suitable for both personal and client projects. Note that each end-product or domain requires its own Regular License.
can_you_explain_the_extended_license: Can you explain the Extended License?
an_extended_license_is_needed_for: An Extended License is needed for a single end-product that involves charging end-users, such as with a subscription model or in a marketplace. This applies to both your own projects and those developed for clients. Each end-product or domain usage demands a separate Extended License.
which_license_should_i_use_for_a_saas_ap: Which license should I use for a SaaS application?
if_your_saas_application_charges_users: If your SaaS application charges users, you'll need an Extended License for each end product. Otherwise, a Regular License is adequate. You can learn more from Envato.
do_you_provide_design_frames_and_github_: Do you provide design frames and GitHub access?
dashtail_itself_doesnt_include_figma: DashTail itself doesn’t include Figma design files automatically, but we're happy to provide them for free upon request. This allows for flexible customization within Figma. If you need GitHub access then you can ask our support team. for GitHub access.
what_skills_are_needed_to_use_dashtail: What skills are needed to use DashTail?
using_dashtail_effectively_requires: Using DashTail effectively requires a foundational knowledge of front-end development, particularly with Tailwind and React for deeper customization. It's important to remember that DashTail is a front-end template; knowledge of back-end development is also necessary for full project development.
how_are_updates_and_upgrades_handled: How are updates and upgrades handled?
the_latest_dashtail_version_can_always_b: The latest DashTail version can always be downloaded from ThemeForest without any extra charge. Updates can be easily integrated by referring to our changelog and GitHub repository.
we_offer_dedicated_support_through_our_p: We offer dedicated support through our portal, following Envato's item support policy closely to provide timely and efficient help.
absolutely_dashtail_is_meticulously_craf: Absolutely. DashTail is meticulously crafted to streamline the development process, offering a seamless and efficient way to build your web UI. It's a worthwhile investment for any developer looking for quality and efficiency.
how_can_i_get_help_with_dashtail: How can I get help with DashTail?
for_assistance_head_over_to_our_support_: For assistance, head over to our support portal, register, and submit a ticket. Our dedicated support team is ready to tackle any issues you might face.
dashtail_stands_as_a_prudent_investment: DashTail stands as a prudent investment, safeguarding you against thousands in potential expenses. With every update, amplify its value even further.
suitable_for_you_or_one_client: Suitable for you or one client, this license covers a single end product that is accessible to end users without charge.
should_your_business_necessitate: Should your business necessitate a unique licensing arrangement, please Get In Touch to explore customized solutions.
dashtail_tailwind_react_next_admin_dashb: DashTail - Tailwind, React Next Admin Dashboard Template
dashtail_is_a_developer_friendly: DashTail is a developer-friendly, ready-to-use admin template designed for building attractive, scalable, and high-performing web applications, powered by the cutting-edge technologies of Next.js and Tailwind CSS.
